Hunting contains everything you need to know to manage to retake the hunting and is Swedens most downloaded, content-rich and brightest utbildningsapp for prospective hunters to get a hunting license and for more experienced hunters who want to brush up on their skills before hunting season.  The full version of Hunting has received more than 400 five-star reviews Google Play and has been featured on including jagareforbundet.se, jaktjournalen.se, jaktbloggen.com, macworld.se, pcforalla.idg.se, prisjakt .com / stuff and in the newspaper Jaktmarker & Fishing.   FREE TEST BEFORE YOU BUY   Hunting Lite is a limited trial version that gives you a taste of what the full version of Hunting has to offer. To get access to all content and features, you must purchase the full version of Hunting.   Content in the full version    1000 theory questions with clear explanations.   Educational and foreseeable correction related questions directly to the right part of the hunting theory or game encyclopedia.   Three different types of tests: smart practice tests, theory test and self test where you choose all the settings.   Advanced Query database to sort out questions answered.   Easy to read and searchable teoribok with lots of pictures, examples and useful features - keep reading where you left off, see how much you have left to learn in each chapter and insert bookmarks at key pieces.   The ability to pause and resume the test and go through all the previous trials.   Searchable game encyclopedia with over 100 artpresentationer and hundreds of high resolution photos.   Smart checklist that guides you through all the steps until hunting.   Sample Statistics that shows your development curve and what you need to practice.   High design adapted to all screen sizes.   No fixation. No hidden fees. No advertisement.   Quick support by e-mail.   100% current content  Theory questions in Hunting covers just about everything mentioned in the latest literature and as soon as a law or a rule introduced or changed so we update the content in the app.
